page.title: 19POWFOOT GOLF COURSE I
page.content: Powfoot Golf Course is an important place,as it is the only one in the area,and lots of people go there. The date when the golf course was built was in 19O3,it opened on the 27 June.The first general meeting was on 20 February.The land was owned by Edward Brook.The course originally had 9 holes and was eventually increased in 1911 to 18 holes.During the first and second world wars,however,5 holes were cultivated,thus reducing the course to 13 holes. It was restored in 1949. In 1953,when the club celebrated its jubilee,they had a most interesting Exhibition Match between two of the best known Scottish Amateur Internationalists of that time. There is a tower for you to go up,and look for your golf balls.
